original_text: The king also said to Zadok the priest, “Do you understand? Go back to the city with my blessing. Take your son Ahimaaz with you, and also Abiathar’s son Jonathan. You and Abiathar return with your two sons.
korean_text: 왕이 또 제사장 사독에게 이르되 네가 선견자가 아니냐 너는 너희의 두 아들 곧 네 아들 아히마아스와 아비아달의 아들 요나단을 데리고 평안히 성읍으로 돌아가라

sentences.original_text: The king also said to Zadok the priest
Go back to the city with my blessing.
Take your son Ahimaaz with you
You and Abiathar return with your two sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 네와 아비아달은 너희 두 아들과 함께 돌아오라.
